title: NHS will die under Reform unless doctors stop striking and work with Labour, says Wes Streeting
description: Health secretary calls on doctors to embrace Labour’s plan to prevent Nigel Farage getting into power and dismantling the health service
content:
Unless doctors stop striking and help Labour fix the damage inflicted by the Tories, the NHS will end up dying under a government led by Reform, Wes Streeting has warned.
Speaking at a special meeting of the British Medical Association’s representati... [2929 chars]

title: Starmer urged to make ‘populist case’ for workers’ rights reforms
description: Huge survey reveals employment rights policies are popular with public despite many not knowing about bill
content:
Keir Starmer must make the “populist case” for workers’ rights reforms, unions have said, after a new mega-poll suggested the changes were the most popular of almost all policies but have extremely limited public recognition.
The employment rights bi... [3859 chars]

title: Last Night of the Proms review - star turns, good-natured flag waving and a rich Rule, Britannia!
description: Bill Bailey played a mean typewriter, Brian May and Roger Taylor raised laughs with Bohemian Rhapsody and trumpeter Alison Balsom bid a poignant farewell at just 46
content: For many, the banner waving at classical music’s annual jamboree evokes pride and a celebration of shared heritage. The discomfort felt by others may have been sharper this year as Promenaders heading to South Kensington shared the streets with the f... [2570 chars]

title: Oblique Seville: World Athletics Championship 100m gold ushers in new era for Jamaican sprinting
description: Oblique Seville ends Jamaica's nine-year wait for a global 100m title with his hero Usain Bolt watching on at the World Athletics Championships in Tokyo.
content:
A vest torn apart in an outburst of elation. An ecstatic Usain Bolt celebrating in the crowd. A new era for Jamaican sprinting.
The significance of Bolt's presence - and evident emotional investment - was not lost on newly crowned world 100m champion... [4946 chars]

title: Police hunt Tommy Robinson supporter who called for Keir Starmer to be ‘assassinated’ during rally
description: A clip has been widely shared online and triggered furious reactions
content:
Police are searching for a Tommy Robinson supporter who was caught on camera calling for Prime Minister Sir Keir Starmer to be shot during Saturday’s huge Unite The Kingdom rally in central London.
Speaking to former Tory councillor and conspiracy th... [2364 chars]
